data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Lanao del Norte, Philippines that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lanao del Norte, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Lanao del Norte, Philippines be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Lanao del Norte, Philippines.
data.prayer: Spirit, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, show your mercy on the 1,265,318 people in Lanao del Norte who are far from you. Please add 294 new house churches this year.
Lord, the believers in the state of Lanao del Norte, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, move the 204,782 believers in the state of Lanao del Norte to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Lanao del Norte who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Lanao del Norte, Philippines into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

location.name: Lanao del Norte
location.cities_list: Iligan, Iligan City, Mantampay, Boroon, Dalipuga
location.cities_list_w_pop: Iligan (342,618), Iligan City (312,323), Mantampay (265,032), Boroon (15,490), Dalipuga (14,242)
